<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Programme : Stimulation langagière intensive (SLI)">1e56ebde1b004a508d594047bc4bcb1e</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:3179e5811bb0c2108d594047bc4bcb26</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>non admissible receptif</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	
      return;
   }
   if (( ["adequat","leger","leger-a-modere"].includes(g_form.getValue("orth_langage_r_ceptif_dans_sa_langue_dominante")) && ["adequat","leger","leger-a-modere"].includes(g_form.getValue("orth_langage_expressif_dans_sa_langue_dominante")))){
    g_form.showFieldMsg('orth_langage_r_ceptif_dans_sa_langue_dominante',"L'élève ne répond pas aux critères d'admissibilité au programme ROI",'error');
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>servicenowdeveloper3@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-20 14:39:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>508b5dfd1b4986508d594047bc4bcb68</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>non admissible receptif</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Triage 2.0" source="x_ndecd_triage_2_0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Triage 2.0">c48de0481bafed508d594047bc4bcb3d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_508b5dfd1b4986508d594047bc4bcb68</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>servicenowdeveloper3@ecolecatholique.ca</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-20 15:08:37</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
